name: NSSliderTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that provides a slider control for choosing a value in a range.

items.name: var slider: NSSlider
items.desc: The slider displayed by the bar item.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: The text displayed alongside the slider.

items.name: var minimumValueAccessory: NSSliderAccessory?
items.desc: The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the minimum value.

items.name: var maximumValueAccessory: NSSliderAccessory?
items.desc: The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the maximum value.

items.name: var valueAccessoryWidth: NSSliderAccessory.Width
items.desc: The width of the value accessories that appear at either end of the slider.

items.name: var target: AnyObject?
items.desc: An object that is notified when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.

items.name: var action: Selector?
items.desc: The selector on the target object that is invoked when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String!
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.
